hook.text: Cameras will get smarter. AI will get stronger. But will photography still mean what it means today?

buildup.text: Future cameras may compose, expose, and edit autonomously. The photographer's role could shift to pure curation.

discovery.text: Light field cameras, 3D capture, and immersive formats are expanding what a 'photograph' can be.
